member.name: P:EntLibContrib.Query.Database.Properties.DesignResources.DataParameterDataDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Data Parameters are used for nearly all data queries and add DbType data type and Direction information to data query parameters so that you can state the data type and direction (In, Out or InOut) of your parameters..

member.name: P:EntLibContrib.Query.Database.Properties.DesignResources.DataQueryDataDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Data Queries target relational databases and because these queries interface to the DAAB can support any relational database that the DAAB can. Data Queries convert to DBCommand objects through the DAAB and can run SQL query strings, call stored procedures (where supported) and even target tables directly (where supported). Parameters convert over to DBParameter objects..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Data Query.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The source column name from the DataSet..

member.name: P:EntLibContrib.Query.Database.Properties.DesignResources.DataSetParameterDataColumnDisplayName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Column.

member.name: P:EntLibContrib.Query.Database.Properties.DesignResources.DataSetParameterDataDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The DataSet parameters are sometimes referred to as DataAdapter parameters in that they are used when the data source is a DataSet. This parameter type adds two additional properties to the ones used for Data Parameters..
